2BR 850ft2
39th St, Newport Beach, CA
Unprecedented Value in Luxurious Laguna and Newport Beach Villa Rentals

Bedrooms 2

Parking 1 dedicated
DESCRIPTION
~Balboa Gem~
The Balboa Gem rental presents a beautiful turnkey property located within the first block of Newport Beach, just 8 houses from the sand. Prepare to be charmed and impressed upon reaching the top of the stairs leading into this finely-appointed upper unit. A December 2011 remodel has created a cozy and upscale beach villa where guests can relax and escape the pressures of the day-to-day world. Balboa Gem is ideally located on the Balboa Peninsula less than a block from the sands of Newport Beach. This upper-floor unit is a quiet haven boasting 2 large bedrooms and 1 bath, easily accommodating up to 6 guests. Both bedrooms feature a brand new queen-sized bed with luxury linens, while a leather sofa sleeper is included in the living room. Each bedroom has a flat screen TV, ample closet space, contemporary furniture, black-out shades and a ceiling fan. The luxurious bathroom has a large tub/shower combo, Black Galaxy granite countertops, plenty of cabinet space and fluffy towels for a spa-like experience. A gourmet chef`s kitchen includes every amenity necessary to create special meals - or a quick breakfast or sandwich. Brand new high-end stainless steel appliances compliment Italian granite countertops, while finely-detailed cabinetry and a Kholer sink/faucet complete the upscale look. A four-seat dining table is situated in the dining area and provides a lovely spot for relaxing. Special touches abound in the details, such as leaded glass accents in the front door, modern light fixtures, crown mouldings, sleek window coverings and contemporary artwork & decor. The Balboa Gem features beautiful stone flooring throughout and custom stone baseboard treatments. Accent rugs add warmth to each room and help anchor the comfortable living space where a flat screen TV/DVD is provided, as well as a ceiling fan to circulate fresh ocean breezes. A spacious rooftop deck provides an additional dining and relaxing area with a 4-seat patio set, gas barbeque and potted plants. A shared laundry area with full-size washer and dryer is included, as well as parking for one car in the garage below. Storage space is available in the garage as well as use of the provided beach chairs, umbrellas and beach towels. Short-term parking for a second car is available directly in front of the garage and is a terrific asset in a busy beach community like Balboa. An outdoor hot and cold shower is located on the east side of the property for post-beach rinse offs. When it comes to a relaxing beach vacation, the Balboa Beach Gem has it all -- unbeatable value, stylish 4-star accommodations, budget-friendly rates, and a fantastic location. Guests will feel right at home in this cozy beach villa and will want to return year after year to enjoy the charms and fun of Newport Beach.

Hello! So here`s the deal: we (2 guys/2 gals) are looking for someone to live with us in a 5BR house in West Philly. As housemates go, we`re pretty calm, considerate, clean, generally reasonable, and occasionally interesting and fun. If you share some of these characteristics, this could potentially work. Oh, we also have two dogs (Tonka & Tova) and one cat (Payton).
Here are some reasons you should live with us instead of anywhere else:
1) Landlord lives on site, so yes, shit gets fixed immediately.
2) There is a lot to do in the surrounding area. It`s quite `hip`. See below.
3) Easy parking, gym equipment in the basement, room to grill outside, etc.
4) Only 22 minutes into the city (15th & Market) by trolley.
5) We`re not secretly crazy, so far. Although that`s kind of subjective anyway.
6) There is a chore wheel, and it is enforced with the best of intentions and in a non passive-aggressive manner.
7) We share food with impunity, supported by a robust accounting system. We`re also pretty good at doing dishes in a timely manner.
8) There`s a rock climbing/bouldering wall area under the stairs, if you`re into that thing. Use at your own risk. If you`re not into it, too bad, it`s there anyway.
And here is a video of the place... note that it was taken a year ago, before we moved in, and there have been some significant changes since then (e.g. basement is totally redone, rusted fire escape removed, walls painted, we now have furniture, etc.). But at least you can get a sense of the space. The room that`s available is the one on the third floor in the front (see 2:02 of the video).
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A7mQQ4J1qik
Also, sorry to mislead, but it`s not exactly at 49th & Baltimore - it`s two blocks away. But no one knows where Florence Ave is, and Baltimore sounds better.
This also means that you`re two blocks away from...
Mariposa (arguably the best food co-op in the city)
Dock Street Brewery (arguably the best beer in West Philly)
Queen of Sheba (arguably the best Ethiopian... ok, I`ll stop)
Curio Theater (Shakespeare plays, cheap)
A crapload of other bars, restaurants, liquor & beer stores, etc.
0.5-2 miles (i.e. 5-10 min bike) to:
University of the Sciences
Drexel
UPenn
Bike Score: 97 (Biker`s Paradise)
Walk Score: 88 (Very Walkable)
Transit Score: 79 (Excellent Transit)
[Why don`t all postings have this?]
Inside:
Washer/Dryer
Brand new kitchen w/ dishwasher!
Central Air (A/C)
Lease Term: $525/month for 1 year. $525 deposit required to move in.
Utilities: Figure about $75/month for gas, electric, internet. We don`t have cable right now.
Furniture: Bring whatever you want for your bedroom, otherwise we`re pretty much set.
PS: We are not looking to add any more animals to our household right now. But animal-lovers are preferable. Send us an email to schedule a viewing of the property and the third floor front bedroom.
We are open to all genders, races, sexual preferences, etc.

postings.body:
Located in the heart of Provincetown`s desirable West End, this quintessential Cape offers The Perfect Location for your vacation getaway. The property is surrounded by perennial gardens on a quiet gravel-lined private way (that primarily gets just foot traffic), and is a stone`s throw from The West End Beach in one direction and Provincetown`s bustling entertainment, dining and shopping districts in the other.
Our newly remodeled home is appointed with all the comforts and amenities that discerning travelers typically expect and require. The home is decorated with a unique mix of oriental rugs and traditional furniture as WELL as contemporary design, while the walls showcase paintings from local area artists.
The first floor has a striking open concept, expansive 45-foot long kitchen, dining, living area, which is ideal for relaxing and entertaining. The fully-equipped gourmet kitchen has vaulted ceilings and granite countertops, and leads directly to a private patio where friends can gather to enjoy late afternoon cocktails and conversation in a beautifully landscaped garden. The two first floor bedrooms are located at opposite ends of the house, offering COMPLETE privacy. The master bedroom has a king size bed and en-suite private bath with rain shower, including private access to the garden patio through french doors. The second bedroom with a queen sized bed is directly adjacent to the second bathroom which includes a Kohler hydrotherapy tub. Interior stairs lead down to a full basement with washer/dryer and additional storage area for your use.

A beautiful single family brick house as a first-time rental situates at a premier quiet street with a short walking distance to the BC campus and T-station (Green line, B-Branch). A great location near Brighton Centre and Chestnut Hill offers easy access to downtown Boston.
First Floor:
A renovated eat-in kitchen connects to an entertainment-size dining room and overlooks a lovely backyard with a patio. The kitchen (17` x 17`) features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and wine cooler, beautiful granite counter and tile floor. Spacious living room with fireplace and hardwood floors is ideal for entertainment and gathering. A half-bath is in excellent conditions. A study den with an archway off the living room adds charms to this lovely main floor.
Second Floor:
There are three bright and spacious bedrooms. Master bedroom has huge closet space including a cedar closet. Wide and open hallway makes each bedroom a quiet retreat. A renovated large full bathroom features a separated bathtub and shower as well as double sinks.
Third Floor:
Accessed from a formal staircase, the third floor presents fourth bedroom and a full bath. Another unfinished room offers ample storage space.
Basement:
It is at the street-level, and used as a convenient entry/exit for the house. Well-lit finished space with washer/dryer can be used for recreation and excise.
One-car attached garage with a drive-way for another off-street parking. The property offers a private back-yard with a patio for perfect outdoor enjoyment.
Indeed, this brick house is one of the best Brighton has ever to offer! If interested, please call

postings.body: Though it`s nicknamed the Bear`s Den, this beautiful and spacious home is anything but. Featuring an impressive, wide-open floor plan and dozens of large windows, sunlight shines through this house at all hours of the day. The windows also offer guests the chance to gaze out at the astounding views all around them, from the towering pine trees nearby to the spectacular mountains in the distance. No matter what time of year you visit the Bear`s Den, the setting will astonish you.   Featuring high, vaulted ceilings and breathtaking views, this 2,886 square-foot home has a wide-open layout that makes it perfect for big gatherings, cooking, game nights, and more. The house has a lot of rooms and can comfortably sleep 10 people in its four different bedrooms. The kids will enjoy the game room downstairs, which includes games, a pool table, and couches for watching sports or playing video games. The main living area is gigantic and features spectacular views, a warm fireplace, and lots of places to sit down and relax with a good book or a stiff drink. The kitchen is big and will allow multiple cooks to do their thing at the same time. Moreover, nearly every room in the house features large windows with breathtaking views. Best of all, the property is pet friendly and it even has a dog run!   Nestled in a quiet area and surrounded by a beautiful forest and picturesque mountains in the distance, sitting in the private hot tub in the back yard or lounging on the wrap-around balcony is a truly beautiful and relaxing treat. When you`ve had enough of the outdoors come back inside and enjoy the home`s many amenities. In addition to the hot tub, balcony, and game room, the home features a washer and dryer, a dishwasher, a BBQ, a fireplace, a 2-car garage, and wireless Internet. Included are 1 king bed, 2 queen beds, and a twin bed that are all in separate bedroom, as well as 4 twin beds in the loft area.   One of the home`s best features is the master bedroom, which is perfect for any couple wanting to spend some intimate time away from the group. The master bedroom features a large TV, a cozy king bed, and double showerhead in the shower.   If you`re looking to stay in a secluded home that has awesome views of the nearby forests and mountains, look no further than the Bear`s Den. This home is 7 miles away from the area`s casinos, 5 miles away from Heavenly Ski Resort, and 7 miles away from the lake itself.   Bed Configurations: 1 King, 1 Queen, 1 Queen, 1 Twin, 4 Twins in Loft.   Square Footage:  2,886 Square Feet.   Distance in Miles To: Casinos = 7 mi. | Heavenly = 5 mi. | Lake Tahoe = 7 mi.To check the price, availability, pictures, and additional details of this property, or to book, http://www.zaranga.com/South-Lake-Tahoe-CA-vacation-rentals/109&utm_campaign=cc If you have questions, call us for rental # 109 **Please note that the above rate is the starting nightly rental rate for this property.**

postings.body: This Gardner Mountain home is a place to take your entire family for a memorable vacation. Looking like a small rancher from the front, this pet-friendly four-bedroom home is perfect for a large family or a large group of friends. The entrance to the luxurious home is not spectacular, but the moment you enter the home, you feel like you have traveled to another world altogether. The living room features an eclectic mix of furniture and colors. The main sofa is multi-colored with interesting patterns. There is a tan leather recliner and a blue-leather stuffed chair with an ottoman in the same colored leather. All these face a flat-screen TV on top of a wooden unit. In a corner of the room is a fireplace on a stone background. The dining-cum-kitchen area of the home is bright and colorful. The dining table is a sturdy wooden one with multi-colored leather straight-backed chairs. There is a door leading from here toward the deck. There is a large glass window on one wall, which ensures a lot of natural light. The modern kitchen is loaded with all the latest amenities and appliances. The first bedroom of the home has a lovely dark wooden queen bed with high headboards. On one side of the room is a window letting in the sunlight. Just below the window is a dark wooden chest of drawers, and next to this, is a high-back stuffed chair. The second bedroom too has a queen bed done in dark wood, with a faux leather cushioned head rest. Both sides of the bed have bedside tables but only one table has a reading lamp atop. A checkered chair lies in a corner of the room. The third bedroom comes with a wooden queen bed and a twin bed. A blinded window dominates one wall and bathes the room in natural light. The fourth bedroom again has a queen bed in dark wood and with a high headrest. A dark wooden high table is on one side of the bed, and the other side has this lovely window that lets you gaze out in to the wilderness all around. This home also has a family room with a wood-burning stove, plush stuffed sofas, and a day bed.  With amenities such as large back deck, a two-car garage, great wooded views, wireless Internet, and washer and dryer, this home is convenient and comfortable. The home`s close proximity to Heavenly Ski Resort, Lake Tahoe, and the Casinos makes it even more perfect. And you need not leave your pooch behind! In this home you`ll find a large kitchen with a big island, a nice-sized living area, plush, comfortable couches, and a gorgeous stone wall that features a fireplace. Additionally, the home features a big loft. A staircase leads upstairs and up there you will find beds as well as a few more places to lounge and read, socialize, or play games. The bathrooms in this home are spacious, too. This home is located in a wooded lot and has lots of windows, so no matter what the season, you`ll get plenty of sunshine shining through. The house features a full kitchen, a washer and dryer, a large front deck, a fireplace, and a 27-inch TV in the living area. You`ll certainly appreciate the open aspect of the living area: not only will you find yourself dining with your friends in this communal space, but it is also perfect for movie night, game night, or entertaining. One of the best aspects of this property is the large front deck, which wraps a good ways around the house and offers a lot of space for lounge chairs, a dining table, and more. This deck is perfect for sunbathing or grilling in the summer, but even in the winter you might find yourself sitting out there star-gazing if there isn`t too much snow. And again, the large windows and the big, sliding glass doors that lead out to the deck offer spectacular views of the wooded lot and beyond. If you`re looking for a rustic, cozy home in the middle of the woods, look no further! Get your friends and family in this home today and start enjoying the wide-open layout, the gigantic deck, and the gorgeous views from the loft. The main living area features lots of light, a sliding-glass door out to the deck/balcony, a comfortable couch, some big, cozy chairs, and a gorgeous fireplace built into the wall. There`s a nice-sized TV right next to the fireplace as well, and it can be seen from all of the main communal areas of the home. Right next to the living area you`ll find the dining area, which features a big table that can seat up to six people. The kitchen features a bar/island that can be used for additional seating and it also has a lot of counter space, modern appliances, and a good amount of storage. The bedrooms in this home are all carpeted and all of the beds are big and cozy. One of the bedrooms even has its own sliding-glass door that leads right out onto a private balcony that overlooks the lagoon and the surrounding mountains. It`s the perfect little balcony for anyone who wants some privacy during their stay. Additional amenities in the home include a fireplace, a washer and dryer, a BBQ, a boat dock, Internet access, a TV with DVD player, a dishwasher, and more. The main attractions at this condo are the community amenities and the outdoor spaces. There`s a nice little patio right outside the main living area that is perfect for relaxing, having your morning coffee and reading the paper, or just chatting with friends. It overlooks the water and the piers surrounding you. This patio leads down across the lawn and towards the boat docks and piers. Your kids will really love all of this open lawn, which is perfect for play time in both the summer and the winter. Staying in this condo will also give you access to many of the amazing amenities included with the Tahoe Keys Resort. You`ll have access to a community swimming pool, a community hot tub, community grills, and the piers and boat docks that sit right next to you on the water. postings.body: This country-style, pet-friendly home is very close to downtown Tahoe City. With only a half-mile walk to town along the bike path, this home is superbly located. And the comfort and conveniences that this home offers makes it a great vacation rental option for a mid-sized family. The outside view of the home is a country-style cabin and the inside offers tasteful décor and pleasant art work. The sunken living room comes complete with high cathedral ceilings, slate floors, and a big rock fireplace. The comfortable couches are new--please don`t jump on them--and they face the fireplace and the wall unit with TV/DVD/VHS, HD cable package, and CD player/stereo. The impressive port-hole window gives you a view of the outside deck and of the surrounding forest. There are bold wooden pillars that give the home a rustic and sturdy look. Behind the couches is the dining area with a round wooden dining table with seating for four. The large picture window lets you enjoy the unspoiled view while you enjoy your perfect meal. Next to the dining area is the lovely kitchen, which features knotty pine paneling and tiled countertops. The kitchen also has a wet bar, and counter stools for a quick bite if you are not in the mood to lay the table. This comfortable home has three bedrooms, all done very beautifully. The master bedroom is located upstairs with a lovely queen bed and a large cabinet with an intricately cut wooden frame mirror on top. The window next to the bed brings in the warm sunlight. There are two bedside tables with reading lamps atop that will allow you to curl up in bed and read your favorite paperback. One of the two baths in the home is attached to this bedroom. At the top of the spiral staircase, and above the kitchen, is the loft with a suede sofa-bed, a privacy curtain, and a small closet. The other two bedrooms are located downstairs with mirror-image queen beds. The bedrooms come compete with cheery and bright linens, blinded windows, mirrors atop storage cabinets, and colorful paintings on the wall. A fully renovated bath is at the end of the hallway. This beautiful vacation rental features a nice outdoor hot tub on the side deck overlooking the nursery and the woodsy setting. With a gas grill and a low fenced forest floor backyard, you can sit down and soak up the sun. The fenced forest backyard is great for a little dog to frolic around in--indeed a charming, cozy retreat for you and your loved ones. postings.body: This newly remodeled mountain home boasts an open layout and tasteful Tahoe décor. Centrally located in a quiet North Shore neighborhood, this pet-friendly home is large and comes loaded with high-end appliances as well as a state-of-the-art entertainment center. This is a lovely place to spend some great times with your family and friends--and the pooch! The entire home features hardwood floors, thick carpeting, wood-paneled ceilings, and windows all around to let in the natural light. The large living room has a wet bar at its far end. A rocking chair in front of the wet bar ensures you a comfortable place to sit and enjoy your cocktails. The living area has multiple couches and a sleeper pull-out facing a large wood-burning stone fireplace. One corner of the living area is dedicated to the state-of-the-art entertainment center. The dining area has a very stylish wooden table with seating for six. Right next to the dining area is the kitchen, which has been newly refurbished with wooden cabinetry, granite countertops, and all the modern appliances you might need to rustle up a meal. The granite countertop also has three high chairs for you to use to grab a quick bite. There are four bedrooms in this home, all featuring cozy carpeting, comfortable beds, and eclectic décor. The master bedroom with fine woodwork is upstairs, and comes complete with a TV, a sitting area, and a full bath with jetted tub. The queen bed has cheery linens, while the sofa is done in black. The second and third bedrooms are next to each other and are connected by a Jack & Jill full bath. The second bedroom features one queen bed and the third bedroom a full/double bed. Both are like mirror images of each other, done up in eclectic linens and featuring assorted wall decorations. The fourth bedroom is simple and minimalistic with two twin beds upholstered in floral bedspreads. The cushions on both of these beds are bear-shaped and attractive. There is also another 3/4 bath in this house, and a bonus room done in a pinkish hue. Featuring a large pool table, one queen futon, chairs for sitting, and a half bath attached, this bonus room makes for a perfect family room. It`s a great place to catch a movie late at night. Or let the kids take the room over and make it into a play area. Once you step outside, you`ll find yourself looking at the verdant greenery all around you. The private hot tub is located at the back of the house--perfect for soaking in the warmth and enjoying the great views. Additional facilities in this house include a gas grill, washing machine and clothes dryer, icemaker, Internet with WiFi, patio furniture, and RV/boat parking.  Bed Configuration: Bedroom 1 (Master): 1 Queen Bed (upstairs) | Bedroom 2: 1 Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: 1 Full/Double Bed | Bedroom 4:  2 Twins | Bonus Room: 1 Queen Futon | Living Room: 1 Sleeper Sofa Pullout.To check the price, availability, pictures, and additional details of this property, or to book, http://www.zaranga.com/Carnelian-Bay-CA-vacation-rentals/425&utm_campaign=cc If you have questions, call us for rental # 425 **Please note that the above rate is the starting nightly rental rate for this property.**

postings.body: This extremely sunny chalet is located on a wide and deep waterway and has very quick and easy access to the lake. When you walk out your back door you`ll find a boat dock all your own. If you`re planning to bring a boat to Lake Tahoe, this is the perfect place to stay. What`s more, you won`t find a sunnier spot than this in the entire Lake Tahoe area: the chalet faces the water with a spectacular wall of windows that let in tons of light and also give you astounding views of the water, the surrounding mountains, and the quiet, peaceful waterfront neighborhood surrounding you. The living space in this chalet is completely wide open and allows for spectacular views out of the gigantic windows. The living area is also carpeted and features a few large, cozy couches. Sit down and read a good book or enjoy a stiff drink while gazing out these sensational windows. The living room connects to the dining room and the kitchen and all three make up one big, communal space that is perfect for large gatherings, playing games in large groups, or just gathering together for a movie night. Walk up the stairs in the living area and you`ll find a cozy, carpeted loft that also has astounding views. Up here you will find additional beds, another TV area, and more big sliding glass doors that lead out to an additional deck where you can lounge, sunbathe, or enjoy a good book. Aside from the plentiful sun and the sensational views, one of the biggest perks of staying in this cozy, sunny chalet is the community amenities. For free, you can enjoy any combination of the following amenities: outdoor swimming pool open during the summer; indoor, Olympic-size, heated swimming pool; large outdoor hot tub; sand volleyball courts; basketball courts; putting greens; a private beach; a children`s playground; and seven tennis courts. This chalet also features a garage, 2 HDTVs, a full kitchen, Internet access, a propane grill, a DVD player, a fireplace, a dishwasher, and a washer and dryer. Whether you`re a boat owner looking for a place with a private dock or someone who loves wide open layouts with spectacular views, this is the place for you. Not only can you admire the water from the couch, but you can walk down the pier and get right into it any time you want! So book this chalet today, before someone else is enjoying the sunny deck, the private dock, and the blue paddleboat. Private Boat Dock - 20 Foot Maximum Bed Configuration: King + Trundle (2 Twins)/King + Trundle (2 Twins). postings.body: This beautifully furnished condo offers absolutely beautiful views of the water, mountains, and wetlands surrounding the Lake Tahoe area and is perfect for those looking to get on the water in a boat. Located in one of the best condo areas in the Keys, this condo is within walking distance to the beach, an indoor/outdoor pool, hot tubs, tennis and basketball courts, restaurants, the marina, and more. This comfortable condo features a private boat dock just steps away from the patio and the perfectly mowed green grass is perfect for playtime for the kids. The interior of this condo is very bright and has beautiful hardwood floors as well as comfortable carpeting throughout. There is lots of cozy decor and the couches are huge and comfortable. The island/bar offers a special place to sit and eat dinner or play games, and the cozy wood-burning fireplace offers a great place to snuggle up to after a long day on the slopes or hiking in the mountains. Additionally, the home features 4 TVs with Blu-Ray and DVD players, a charcoal BBQ, a private boat dock, Internet access, a stereo, a game room with a variety of games, a washer and dryer, a dishwasher, and a nice small patio/deck. The master bedroom features a giant sliding-glass door that leads out onto the deck and the views from the bed are simply spectacular! Lay in bed and gaze out at the boats going by and the mountains in the distance. This master bedroom is an absolutely perfect way to end the day. In addition to the amazing interior, this condo also offers a private back patio with a small table, some chairs, and a nice charcoal grill. It`s the perfect place to do some cooking or entertaining or some simple relaxation after a long day. There`s also a green, grassy lawn that leads up to the boat docks and it`ll feel simply perfect under your bare feet in the summertime. In addition to the amazing views of the marina, the lake, and the mountains, this condo offers one other big advantage: you will have access to a ton of community amenities. For FREE, you can enjoy any combination of the following amenities: outdoor swimming pool open during the summer; indoor Olympic-size, heated swimming pool; large outdoor hot tub; sand volleyball courts; basketball courts; putting greens; a private beach; a children`s playground; and several tennis courts. Surrounded by water, a beautiful grassy lawn, and tons of natural beauty, this condo is located just a quarter of a mile from the lake and is centrally located for many of the special things that you will want to do while you,re in Lake Tahoe.
